column3:
shame no sound me ans. your app is crashing cause of no sound took game 
out. fixit

My favourite version of 2048 I like the undo feature, since tiles can appear randomly; if I get going too fast or leave my finger too close to the screen while thinking... I feel no shame in undoing such a move. My beef with this game is that there are CLEARLY players using cheats.  Look at the leader board: there are players i...Full ReviewI like the undo feature, since tiles can appear randomly; if I get going too fast or leave my finger too close to the screen while thinking... I feel no shame in undoing such a move. My beef with this game is that there are CLEARLY players using cheats.  Look at the leader board: there are players in the top 3 who are Rookie (level 1) in 3rd place worldwide, with a score in the hundreds of millions, with no puzzle XP! How is that even possible?!  I'm pretty good at this and my high score is 2.5+ million.
Grrrrrr I love the game, but now i need to get a new phone because the image of the game board is burned into my screen. Uninstalling. No, I'm not kidding. And as you can see, i said i love the game.
I love this game! I like games that makes me! think hard and challenges me
How can I put my profile picture
Please make an option  to save game...if the other person wants to start a new one then ?????
Best of the games Days of playing.   Love it!   Maybe a dark skin version someday?
Brain exercise Great puzzle game to play in your free time

Froze After several days of playing, got a score of 500000. Whew, great! But now I want to start a new game but it is frozen! I will lose my high score if I had to reinstall it. This happened once before. Needs fixed!
Too easy. I got 2048 in like, 5 minutes. And the game just keeps going there's no ending or any reward or... Anything at all for the matter.

Excellent game Excellent game. There is though a problem with the leaderboard as the first 30 players, the ones over 1,000,000 points seem that they got the points from another game. Needs correcting please

My favorite endless game, but... I'll be replacing my phone soon and don't want to lose my progress, I don't have enough time or patience to start all over again and gain another 40+ million high score.
Good and bad! Use it in two plataforms, on mobile works just fine, on tablet, gets unresponsive when moving numbers.

Longest puzzle game ever This is the first puzzle game where a single round has lasted several hours played over 3 days and it's still far from over.  I'm at over 210,000 points and still going.  The swipe should be more responsive but I'm used to it now.  Much better than the 4x4 version, way less claustrophopic.
2048 I like it because it is a lot of fun but at the same time it is very challenging.
I love this app This app is really mind blowing game coz its compare with chess and other mind game..

Login We're not told to login, until we die. I have only played one single game, and got almost 300k ... but then on exploring your buttons notice I have ZERO achievements ... because you didn't say we needed to log in :/ Not hanging around to find more stupid mistakes. C'ya.
Super fun but gets hard tho

I'm in love with the undo button.. Please never take that away~
AWWWWW YEEEEEAAAAAH~~~ Giving back the 5 star love for putting in a pop up menu for the new game icon....I've been playing for the last 30 mins instead of doing my work. Hmmm...this is bad. :-)
Adictionnnnnn I have a dangerous addiction from this game played for non_stop 2 hours @ first time. Thanks to Makers team.
Confusing On my other phone I had already finished all of the multiples. On this app I've already finished the 1 multiple, but it won't let me do the next multiple. Uninstall
I seriously LOVE THIS GAME if I start playing this game I will not be able to stop playing .
Good one! but hangs very often
ADS! Cannot play the game due to ads! It's super awesome concept but the ads at the bottom of the screen kills the fun.
Loved it All I can say is this is a very good game and fun but is takes a long time
Nothing special No night mode, no tile movement sound, no options for board size.
ViVo Y11iW I like this IQ test games.
Khaled Saleh It's a great challenge
Because it does not freeze and fun
Good game But does the ads have to flash?
Awesome puzzle game! Hours of fun!
